The Recollective only sends interesting emails.
Receive 10% off when you subscribe.

settings.title: Heading
settings.text: Text area can be used for special announcements or general information.

settings.title: SECOND HAND GOODS
settings.content:
The Recollective is devoted to providing a curated modern selection of
second hand goods. We care about the impact that shopping second
hand plays in a circular economy.

settings.title: SHOP THE DROP
settings.text:
Join us on Instagram
@PrelovedOttawa to shop
our daily drops in
stories.

settings.title: CONSIGN WITH US
settings.text:
Submit your clothing
& accessories to be considered
for consignment.

settings.title: Were Carla & Kelly
settings.text:
Were sisters who share a sense
of humour, a passion for fashion
& a deep awareness of the
impact that shopping second hand
plays in a circular economy

settings.title: VISIT US SOON
settings.content:
Local to Ottawa? Come and visit our new boutique location when we reopen.
Were located at:
1281B Wellington Street West, Ottawa, ON
